quoteText: Except where forbidden by law, under all circumstances, HUAWEI will accept no responsibility for all indirect, derivative, incidental, collateral, or punitive damages that may be incurred from usage of this website, including but not limited to profit loss, even if HUAWEI is already aware of the potential risks.
title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
